attributes.action: Stop PRESCRIPTIONS DELIVERY   CHARGE BOOTS PHARMACY
attributes.additional_details: Stop  Boots charging  for delivery of prescriptions starts on 23rd /9 2019 charging £5 delivery or £55 year
attributes.background: My mother86  recieved  letter with her prescription  about charge on delivery £5 or £55 p.a. lot people cant get out might be age or mental health illness

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for Boots Pharmacy, rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could raise the issue with them. You can find out how to contact the company here:

http://www.boots-uk.com/about-boots-uk/company-information/contact-us/
